description: The United Nations provides students with overview of the global organization that has been serving the world since 1945. Detailed information and helpful graphics will keep students engaged as they learn more about the UN and its many roles in striving for international cooperation. This book can also be used to teach students how to summarize a text as well as identify the main idea and details to better understand information. The book and lesson are also available for levels Y and Z2.
